Articles.Content:
Oh no! The HypeTrain is running out of HypeFuel! Venus Man, where are you?

Wait, what is that up in the sky? Is it a bird, is it a plane? Is it a cloud of sulfur heated to 900F? Is it...oh wait it is a cloud of sulfur heated to 900F!

Venus Man comes to the rescue! With his magical Venusian-based powers, he feeds molten sulfur and rotten egg air of death directly into the engine, not only supercharging the train but making the passengers choke! THE DAY IS SAVED!

Welcome back Souper, missed you (for all confused people, I believe* he took a break a while back)

* as in maybe, possibly , not totally, will undoubtably be told otherwise next post sure
Venus is so hot, and not in the slang way.
This thread does not appear to have a purpose. Please try to have one of them things when starting threads, okay, guys?
